In England, in the seven days to 22 April, there were 14,181 new confirmed cases (25.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 April, there were 14,659 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (478 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 April is 3,852,904 (6,845.1 cases per 100,000 population).
